publicwhip.spmotion: *S1M-1967 Tommy Sheridan: Stobhill Hospital Industrial Action—That the Parliament offers its support and solidarity to the porters and domestic workers of Stobhill Hospital who have voted for industrial action to support their claim for decent wages and conditions; further notes that they are employed by a private contractor who pays them £4.09 per hour and gives them no holiday pay, inadequate sick pay and no pension, and believes that such conditions will be an increasingly prevalent feature of privatisation in future.
